content:
#  Szkoła Doktorska - informacje -- AGH University Doctoral School 

URL: https://www.sd.agh.edu.pl/en/about-the-school
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:21:46

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 About the School 

The AGH Doctoral School was established by the Ordinance of the Rector of the AGH University of Science and Technology of May 15, 2019. 

Studies at the AGH Doctoral School provide 
creative and inter-disciplinary approach
 to scientific research and 
flexible programme
 allowing every candidate to select courses according to their needs.

The doctoral programme is full-time and lasts between 
 6 and 8 semesters
.

Its major goal is preparation of doctoral thesis. The process is aided by two components: 
individual programme of study
 and 
individual research plan.

Studies at the School are 
free of tuition
. We offer 
high scholarships
 for most of our doctoral candidates. 

The Field of Engineering and technology:

Automation, electronic, electrical engineering and space technologies

Information and communication technology

Biomedical engineering

Chemical engineering

Civil engineering, geodesy and transport

Materials engineering

Mechanical engineering

Environmental engineering, mining and energy

The Field of Natural sciences:

Computer and information sciences

Mathematics

Chemical sciences

Physical sciences

Earth and related environmental sciences

The Field of Social sciences:

Economy and finances

Management and quality studies

Sociology

The Field of Humanities:

Cultural and religious studies
